'Behavior': 'Provide a break in a two-hour or longer class'
'Require students to use standard English in class when they speak or write'
'Use personal experiences as examples in teaching'
'Require students to bring books to class'
'Use the case study method in teaching'
'Assign projects requiring the use of the library'
'Move around in the classroom when teaching'
'Have students read a chapter and answer questions before teaching the content of the chapter'
